intro_text: Your patrol comes across a vole
fail_text: Your patrol narrowly misses the vole
decline_text: Your patrol decides to look for other prey

intro_text: While hunting, r_c comes across a rabbit burrow
success_text: r_c catches the rabbit hiding in its burrow
fail_text: The burrow is abandoned, with no prey to be found in there
decline_text: r_c decides to ignore the burrow

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a small fallen tree blocking their path
success_text: Your patrol successfully moves the tree out of the way and continues the patrol
fail_text: Your patrol can't seem to move the tree out of the way and is discouraged
decline_text: Your patrol decides to find another route to continue to patrol
